description.p: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as directional lamps, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration. You can also combine the four lights into one glowing shape of your choice of Medium size. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds light as if it is a 5 to 30 degree spotlight in the direction of your choice. As a bonus action on your turn, you can turn or move the lights up to 60 feet to a new spot within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light winks out if it exceeds the spell’s range.
A dazzling beam of flashing, colored light springs from your hand toward a creature within range.
The targeted creature must make a Constitution saving throw or become blinded until the start of your next turn.
The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level.

setters.set: a pinch of powder or sand that is colored red, yellow, and blue
